sources.title: Time Limit (1957)
sources.description: Military investigator Colonel Edwards is assigned a case involving Major Cargill, a Korean War POW who is accused of treason. Although Cargill admits his guilt and Edwards' superiors are impatiently pushing Edwards to move this case to court martial, Edwards becomes convinced of Cargill's innocence. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/time-limit-1957/

sources.title: Time Limit (1957) Richard Widmark · Richard Basehart
sources.description: Richard Widmark stars in this court drama as Col. William Edwards, a military lawyer assigned to defend Korean War POW Maj. Cargill of treason. But as commanding officers push Edwards for a swift court-martial, suspicions of a cover-up arise....

metadata.Plot: Military investigator Colonel William Edwards is assigned a case involving Major Harry Cargill, a Korean War prisoner of war who is accused of aiding the enemy. Although Cargill admits his guilt and Edwards' superiors are impatiently pushing him to move this case to court-martial, Edwards doubts eventually convinces him of Cargill's innocence.
metadata.Actors: Richard Widmark, Richard Basehart, Dolores Michaels
metadata.Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Award1 nomination total
